mapper.select: select count(*) from yeps_restaurant where ${search} like '%'||#{searchString}||'%'

select * from (select rownum rn, A.* from(select RT.mnum , RT.rname , RT.foodstyle , RT.rest_regdate , M.name from yeps_restaurant RT, yeps_member M where RT.mnum = M.mnum and RT.rname= rname and M.name=name and replace(upper(#{search}),' ','') like '%'||replace(upper(#{searchString}),' ','')||'%' order by rnum desc)A) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
mapper.insert: insert into yeps_restaurant values(yeps_restaurant_seq.nextval,0,#{rname},#{rest_filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zipNo},#{roadAddrPart1},#{addrDetail},#{roadAddrPart2}, #{raddress},#{hp2},#{hp3},#{foodstyle},#{mon, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tue, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{wed, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{thu, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fri, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sat, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sun,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reststyle},#{reserv},#{delivery},#{takeout},#{parking},#{kidszone},#{groupreserv},#{noise},#{alcohol, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{waiting}, #{wifi},#{toilet},#{tablecount},#{standard},#{busytime, jdbcType=VARCHAR},sysdate,#{mnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{category, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{price, jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select * from yeps_restaurant RT, yeps_files F where RT.rnum = F.rnum and F.ismainphoto = 'y' and RT.rnum = #{rnum}
select count(*) from yeps_restaurant
select count(*) from yeps_restaurant where replace(upper(roadAddrPart1),' ','') like '%'||replace(upper(#{location}),' ','')||'%'
select count(*) from yeps_files where rnum=#{rnum}
select rname from yeps_restaurant where rnum= #{rnum}

select * from (SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT RT.rnum, RT.rname, RT.price, RT.roadAddrPart1, RT.addrDetail, RT.roadAddrPart2, RT.raddress, RT.hp2, RT.hp3, RT.foodstyle, RT.reststyle, RT.category, F.filenum, F.filename FROM yeps_restaurant RT, yeps_files F WHERE RT.rnum = F.rnum AND F.ismainphoto = 'y' AND RT.delivery = '가능' and replace(upper(RT.roadAddrPart1),' ','') like '%'||replace(upper(#{location}),' ','')||'%' ORDER BY rt.rnum DESC ) a) where rn between #{start} and #{end}

select * from (SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT RT.rnum, RT.rname, RT.price, RT.roadAddrPart1, RT.addrDetail, RT.roadAddrPart2, RT.raddress, RT.hp2, RT.hp3, RT.foodstyle, RT.reststyle, RT.category, F.filenum, F.filename FROM yeps_restaurant RT, yeps_files F WHERE RT.rnum = F.rnum AND F.ismainphoto = 'y' AND RT.reserv = '가능' and replace(upper(RT.roadAddrPart1),' ','') like '%'||replace(upper(#{location}),' ','')||'%' ORDER BY rt.rnum DESC ) a) where rn between #{start} and #{end}

select * from (SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT RT.rnum, RT.rname, RT.price, RT.roadAddrPart1, RT.addrDetail, RT.roadAddrPart2, RT.raddress, RT.hp2, RT.hp3, RT.foodstyle, RT.reststyle, RT.category, F.filenum, F.filename FROM yeps_restaurant RT, yeps_files F WHERE RT.rnum = F.rnum AND F.ismainphoto = 'y' AND RT.takeout = '가능' and replace(upper(RT.roadAddrPart1),' ','') like '%'||replace(upper(#{location}),' ','')||'%' ORDER BY rt.rnum DESC ) a) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
select * from yeps_restaurant where rownum=1 order by rnum desc
select * from yeps_restaurant where rnum = #{GETrnum}
select * from yeps_restaurant RT, yeps_files F where 19 >= rownum and RT.rnum = F.rnum and F.ismainphoto = 'y'

select RT.rnum , RT.rname , RT.price , RT.foodstyle , RT.roadAddrPart1 , RT.rest_regdate , F.filename from yeps_restaurant RT, yeps_files F where RT.rnum = F.rnum and F.ismainphoto = 'y' and RT.rnum = #{rnum}
select * from yeps_restaurant where rnum=#{rnum}
select * from yeps_restaurant where zipNo = #{zipNo} and roadAddrPart1 = #{roadAddrPart1} and roadAddrPart2 = #{roadAddrPart2} and addrDetail = #{addrDetail}
select count(*) from yeps_restaurant
select count(*) from yeps_restaurant where replace(upper(roadAddrPart1),' ','') like '%'||replace(upper(#{SearchNear}),' ','')||'%'
select count(*) from yeps_restaurant where replace(upper(rname),' ','') like '%'||replace(upper(#{SearchFind}),' ','')||'%'

select count(*) from yeps_restaurant where replace(upper(roadAddrPart1),' ','') like '%'||replace(upper(#{SearchNear}),' ','')||'%' and replace(upper(rname),' ','') like '%'||replace(upper(#{SearchFind}),' ','')||'%'

select * from (select rownum rn,A.* from(select RT.rnum, RT.rname, RT.price, RT.roadAddrPart1, RT.addrDetail, RT.roadAddrPart2, RT.raddress, RT.hp2, RT.hp3, RT.foodstyle, RT.reststyle, RT.category, F.filenum, F.filename from yeps_restaurant RT, yeps_files F where RT.rnum = F.rnum and F.ismainphoto = 'y' order by RT.rnum desc)A) where rn between #{start} and #{end}

select *from (select rownum rn,A.* from(select RT.rnum, RT.rname, RT.price, RT.roadAddrPart1, RT.addrDetail, RT.roadAddrPart2, RT.raddress, RT.hp2, RT.hp3, RT.foodstyle, RT.reststyle, RT.category, F.filenum, F.filename from yeps_restaurant RT, yeps_files F where RT.rnum = F.rnum and F.ismainphoto = 'y' and replace(upper(roadAddrPart1),' ','') like '%'||replace(upper(#{SearchNear}),' ','')||'%' order by rnum desc)A) where rn between #{start} and #{end}

select *from (select rownum rn,A.* from(select RT.rnum, RT.rname, RT.price, RT.roadAddrPart1, RT.addrDetail, RT.roadAddrPart2, RT.raddress, RT.hp2, RT.hp3, RT.foodstyle, RT.reststyle, RT.category, F.filenum, F.filename from yeps_restaurant RT, yeps_files F where RT.rnum = F.rnum and F.ismainphoto = 'y' and replace(upper(rname),' ','') like '%'||replace(upper(#{SearchFind}),' ','')||'%' order by rnum desc)A) where rn between #{start} and #{end}

select * from (select rownum rn,A.* from(select RT.rnum, RT.rname, RT.price, RT.roadAddrPart1, RT.addrDetail, RT.roadAddrPart2, RT.raddress, RT.hp2, RT.hp3, RT.foodstyle, RT.reststyle, RT.category, F.filenum, F.filename from yeps_restaurant RT, yeps_files F where RT.rnum = F.rnum and F.ismainphoto = 'y' and replace(upper(roadAddrPart1),' ','') like '%'||replace(upper(#{SearchNear}),' ','')||'%' and replace(upper(rname),' ','') like '%'||replace(upper(#{SearchFind}),' ','')||'%' order by rnum desc)A) where rn between #{start} and #{end}

select count(*) from yeps_restaurant where category=#{category} and replace(upper(roadAddrPart1),' ','') like '%'||replace(upper(#{location}),' ','')||'%' and replace(upper(rname),' ','') like '%'||replace(upper(#{searchword}),' ','')||'%'
select count(*) from yeps_restaurant where category=#{category} and replace(upper(roadAddrPart1),' ','') like '%'||replace(upper(#{location}),' ','')||'%'
select count(*) from yeps_restaurant where category=#{category} and replace(upper(rname),' ','') like '%'||replace(upper(#{searchword}),' ','')||'%'
select count(*) from yeps_restaurant where category=#{category}

select count(*) from yeps_restaurant where replace(upper(roadAddrPart1),' ','') like '%'||replace(upper(#{location}),' ','')||'%' and replace(upper(rname),' ','') like '%'||replace(upper(#{searchword}),' ','')||'%'
select count(*) from yeps_restaurant where replace(upper(roadAddrPart1),' ','') like '%'||replace(upper(#{location}),' ','')||'%'
select count(*) from yeps_restaurant where replace(upper(rname),' ','') like '%'||replace(upper(#{searchword}),' ','')||'%'

select * from (select rownum rn, A.* from (select RT.rnum, RT.rname, RT.price, RT.foodstyle, RT.roadAddrPart1, RT.addrDetail, RT.roadAddrPart2, RT.raddress, RT.hp2, RT.hp3, RT.reststyle, RT.category, F.filename from yeps_restaurant RT, yeps_files F where RT.rnum = F.rnum and F.ismainphoto = 'y' and RT.category=#{category} and replace(upper(RT.roadAddrPart1),' ','') like '%'||replace(upper(#{location}),' ','')||'%' and replace(upper(RT.rname),' ','') like '%'||replace(upper(#{searchword}),' ','')||'%' order by RT.rnum desc)A) where rn between #{start} and #{end}

select * from (select rownum rn, A.* from (select RT.rnum, RT.rname, RT.price, RT.foodstyle, RT.roadAddrPart1, RT.addrDetail, RT.roadAddrPart2, RT.raddress, RT.hp2, RT.hp3, RT.reststyle, RT.category, F.filename from yeps_restaurant RT, yeps_files F where RT.rnum = F.rnum and F.ismainphoto = 'y' and RT.category=#{category} and replace(upper(RT.roadAddrPart1),' ','') like '%'||replace(upper(#{location}),' ','')||'%' order by RT.rnum desc)A) where rn between #{start} and #{end}

select * from (select rownum rn, A.* from (select RT.rnum, RT.rname, RT.price, RT.foodstyle, RT.roadAddrPart1, RT.addrDetail, RT.roadAddrPart2, RT.raddress, RT.hp2, RT.hp3, RT.reststyle, RT.category, F.filename from yeps_restaurant RT, yeps_files F where RT.rnum = F.rnum and F.ismainphoto = 'y' and RT.category=#{category} and replace(upper(RT.rname),' ','') like '%'||replace(upper(#{searchword}),' ','')||'%' order by RT.rnum desc)A) where rn between #{start} and #{end}

select * from (select rownum rn, A.* from (select RT.rnum, RT.rname, RT.price, RT.foodstyle, RT.roadAddrPart1, RT.addrDetail, RT.roadAddrPart2, RT.raddress, RT.hp2, RT.hp3, RT.reststyle, RT.category, F.filename from yeps_restaurant RT, yeps_files F where RT.rnum = F.rnum and F.ismainphoto = 'y' and RT.category=#{category} order by RT.rnum desc)A) where rn between #{start} and #{end}

select * from (select rownum rn, A.* from (select RT.rnum, RT.rname, RT.price, RT.foodstyle, RT.roadAddrPart1, RT.addrDetail, RT.roadAddrPart2, RT.raddress, RT.hp2, RT.hp3, RT.reststyle, RT.category, F.filename from yeps_restaurant RT, yeps_files F where RT.rnum = F.rnum and F.ismainphoto = 'y' and replace(upper(RT.roadAddrPart1),' ','') like '%'||replace(upper(#{location}),' ','')||'%' and replace(upper(RT.rname),' ','') like '%'||replace(upper(#{searchword}),' ','')||'%' order by RT.rnum desc)A) where rn between #{start} and #{end}

select * from (select rownum rn, A.* from (select RT.rnum, RT.rname, RT.price, RT.foodstyle, RT.roadAddrPart1, RT.addrDetail, RT.roadAddrPart2, RT.raddress, RT.hp2, RT.hp3, RT.reststyle, RT.category, F.filename from yeps_restaurant RT, yeps_files F where RT.rnum = F.rnum and F.ismainphoto = 'y' and replace(upper(RT.roadAddrPart1),' ','') like '%'||replace(upper(#{location}),' ','')||'%' order by RT.rnum desc)A) where rn between #{start} and #{end}

select * from (select rownum rn, A.* from (select RT.rnum, RT.rname, RT.price, RT.foodstyle, RT.roadAddrPart1, RT.addrDetail, RT.roadAddrPart2, RT.raddress, RT.hp2, RT.hp3, RT.reststyle, RT.category, F.filename from yeps_restaurant RT, yeps_files F where RT.rnum = F.rnum and F.ismainphoto = 'y' and replace(upper(RT.rname),' ','') like '%'||replace(upper(#{searchword}),' ','')||'%' order by RT.rnum desc)A) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
